items.title: CPAP Use Tied to Reduced Mortality in T2D and Sleep Apnea
items.description: In patients with both type 2 diabetes and obstructive sleep apnea, treatment with CPAP may reduce the risk for mortality. Medscape Medical News

items.title: Modified Anesthesia Offers No Neurodevelopment Gain in Kids
items.description: Neurodevelopmental outcomes in children undergoing surgery do not differ when dexmedetomidine and remifentanil are added to standard anesthesia practi...

items.title: FDA Approves Labeling Changes for DEB Gene Therapy
items.description: The indication has been expanded to include use in newborns and allows patients and caregivers to apply the treatment at home. Medscape Medical News

items.title: Frailty Ups Surgery Risks for Older Women With Breast Cancer
items.description: Frailty is associated with higher odds of local and systemic postoperative complications among older women with nonmetastatic breast cancer. Medscape ...
